title: LHOST
extract: Understanding RHost, LHost, PORT [closed] ... In my own understanding the remote host is the target's IP address and the local host is your IP address but if your target is outside of your network you will use your public IP address and if your target is inside in your network you will use the local IP right?Jun 28, 2017
extract_html: Understanding RHost, LHost, PORT [closed] ...
